panels.description: This panel displays all the names of the cluster monitoring the kubernetes events and features

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query: SELECT DISTINCT ClusterName FROM default.events
targets.rawQuery: SELECT DISTINCT ClusterName FROM default.events

panels.title: Monitoring Clusters

panels.description: This panel displays the which cluster has the highest events.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT ClusterName,count(*) AS Events From default.events
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(EventTime) 
GROUP BY ClusterName
ORDER BY Events DESC
LIMIT 1
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT ClusterName,count(*) AS Events From default.events
WHERE EventTime >= toDateTime(1693460315) AND EventTime <= toDateTime(1693460615) 
GROUP BY ClusterName
ORDER BY Events DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Clusters with Most Activity

panels.description: This panel displays the total count of outdated images from all cluster.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.outdated_images
WHERE VersionsBehind > 0
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.outdated_images
WHERE VersionsBehind > 0

panels.title: Number of Outdated Images Across All Clusters

panels.description: This panel displays the total number of events from all cluster.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(EventTime)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE EventTime >= toDateTime(1693460292) AND EventTime <= toDateTime(1693460592)

panels.title: Number of Events across all Clusters

panels.description: This panel displays the total number of DeletedAPIs from all the cluster.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query: SELECT count(*) FROM default.DeletedAPIs
targets.rawQuery: SELECT count(*) FROM default.DeletedAPIs

panels.title: Number of DeletedAPIs across all Clusters

panels.description: This panel displays the total count of DeprecatedAPIs in all cluster.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query: SELECT count(*) FROM default.DeprecatedAPIs
targets.rawQuery: SELECT count(*) FROM default.DeprecatedAPIs

panels.title: Number of DeprecatedAPIs across all Clusters

panels.description: Thos panel displays the total count of resources running in all kubernetes cluster.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query: SELECT count(*) FROM default.getall_resources
targets.rawQuery: SELECT count(*) FROM default.getall_resources

panels.title: Number of k8s_Resources across all Clusters

panels.description: This panel provides a time-based analysis of the occurrences of 'Pod'

targets.rawSql:
SELECT EventTime, COUNT(*) AS Pods
FROM default.events
WHERE Kind = 'Pod'
GROUP BY EventTime;

panels.title: Number of Pods over time

panels.description: This panel provides a time-based analysis of the occurrences of 'Node'

targets.rawSql:
SELECT EventTime, COUNT(*) AS Nodes
FROM default.events
WHERE Kind = 'Node'
GROUP BY EventTime;

panels.title: Number of Nodes over Time

panels.description: This panel displays the total count events related to Pod.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(EventTime) AND Kind IN 'Pod'
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE EventTime >= toDateTime(1693438853) AND EventTime <= toDateTime(1693460453) AND Kind IN 'Pod'

panels.title: Number of Pod creation events

panels.description: This panel displays the total number of pods with Created state.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(EventTime) AND Kind IN 'Pod' AND Reason IN 'Created'
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE EventTime >= toDateTime(1693460172) AND EventTime <= toDateTime(1693460472) AND Kind IN 'Pod' AND Reason IN 'Created'

panels.title: Number of pods with Created state

panels.description: This panel displays the total number of pods with backOff state.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(EventTime) AND Kind IN 'Pod' AND Reason IN 'BackOff'
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE EventTime >= toDateTime(1693460182) AND EventTime <= toDateTime(1693460482) AND Kind IN 'Pod' AND Reason IN 'BackOff'

panels.title: Number of pods with BackOff state

panels.description: This panel displays the total number of pods with Unhealthy state.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(EventTime) AND Kind IN 'Pod' AND Reason IN 'Unhealthy'
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE EventTime >= toDateTime(1693460193) AND EventTime <= toDateTime(1693460493) AND Kind IN 'Pod' AND Reason IN 'Unhealthy'

panels.title: Number of pods with Unhealthy state

panels.description: This panel displays the total count events related to node.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(EventTime) AND Kind IN 'Node'
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE EventTime >= toDateTime(1693438754) AND EventTime <= toDateTime(1693460354) AND Kind IN 'Node'

panels.title: Number of Node creation events

panels.description: This panel displays the total number of nodes which is in not ready state

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(EventTime) AND Kind IN 'Node' AND Reason IN 'NodeNotReady'
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE EventTime >= toDateTime(1693438784) AND EventTime <= toDateTime(1693460384) AND Kind IN 'Node' AND Reason IN 'NodeNotReady'

panels.title: Number of Nodes with NotReady State

panels.description: This panel displays the total number of nodes which is in ready state

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(EventTime) AND Kind IN 'Node' AND Reason IN 'NodeReady'
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE EventTime >= toDateTime(1693438825) AND EventTime <= toDateTime(1693460425) AND Kind IN 'Node' AND Reason IN 'NodeReady'

panels.title: Number of Nodes with Ready State

panels.description: This panel displays the total number of nodes which is in NodeHasNoDiskPressure state

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(EventTime) AND Kind IN 'Node' AND Reason IN 'NodeHasNoDiskPressure'
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT count(*) FROM default.events
WHERE EventTime >= toDateTime(1693438835) AND EventTime <= toDateTime(1693460435) AND Kind IN 'Node' AND Reason IN 'NodeHasNoDiskPressure'

panels.title: Number of Nodes with  NodeHasNoDiskPressure State

panels.description: This panel displays the total number of events per cluster seperated by namespace.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT ClusterName, Namespace, count(Event) AS Events FROM default.events
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(EventTime)
GROUP BY ClusterName,Namespace
ORDER BY Events DESC
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT ClusterName, Namespace, count(Event) AS Events FROM default.events
WHERE EventTime >= toDateTime(1693460424) AND EventTime <= toDateTime(1693460724)
GROUP BY ClusterName,Namespace
ORDER BY Events DESC

panels.title: Events per cluster by Namespace

panels.description: This panel displays the total number of clusters containing DeletedAPIs activity.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ClusterName) AS DeletedAPIs
FROM default.DeletedAPIs
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ClusterName) AS DeletedAPIs
FROM default.DeletedAPIs

panels.title: Number of Clusters Containing DeletedAPIs Activity

panels.description: This panel displays the total number of clusters containing Outdated Images activity.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT count(DISTINCT(ClusterName)) AS OutdatedImages
FROM default.outdated_images
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT count(DISTINCT(ClusterName)) AS OutdatedImages
FROM default.outdated_images

panels.title: Number of Clusters Containing Outdated Images Activity

panels.description: This panel displays the total number of clusters containing DeprecatedAPIs activity.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ClusterName) AS DeprecatedAPIs
FROM default.DeprecatedAPIs
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ClusterName) AS DeprecatedAPIs
FROM default.DeprecatedAPIs

panels.title: Number of Clusters Containing DeprecatedAPIs Activity

panels.description: This panel displays the total count of pods grouped by reason.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT ClusterName, Reason, count(Kind) AS Pods FROM default.events
WHERE Kind IN 'Pod' 
GROUP BY ClusterName,Reason
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT ClusterName, Reason, count(Kind) AS Pods FROM default.events
WHERE Kind IN 'Pod' 
GROUP BY ClusterName,Reason

panels.title: Count of Pods grouped by Reason

panels.description: This panel displays the total count of DeprecatedAPIs for each clusters respectively.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT ClusterName, count(Deprecated) AS DeprecatedAPIs FROM default.DeprecatedAPIs
GROUP BY ClusterName
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT ClusterName, count(Deprecated) AS DeprecatedAPIs FROM default.DeprecatedAPIs
GROUP BY ClusterName

panels.title: Count of DeprecatedAPIs per cluster

panels.description: This panel displays the total count of DeletedAPIs form each clusters respectively.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT ClusterName, count(Deleted) AS DeletedAPIs FROM default.DeletedAPIs
GROUP BY ClusterName
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT ClusterName, count(Deleted) AS DeletedAPIs FROM default.DeletedAPIs
GROUP BY ClusterName

panels.title: Count of DeletedAPIs per cluster

panels.description: This panel displays the total count of outdated images from each cluster respectively.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT ClusterName, count(CurrentImage) AS Outdated_Images FROM default.outdated_images
GROUP BY ClusterName
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT ClusterName, count(CurrentImage) AS Outdated_Images FROM default.outdated_images
GROUP BY ClusterName

panels.title: Count of Outdated Images per cluster

panels.description: This panel displays the total count of Events for each cluster respectively

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select ClusterName,count(Id) AS Events from default.events
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(EventTime) 
group by ClusterName
targets.rawQuery:
select ClusterName,count(Id) AS Events from default.events
WHERE EventTime >= toDateTime(1693460253) AND EventTime <= toDateTime(1693460553) 
group by ClusterName

panels.title: Count of Events per cluster

panels.description: This panel displays the total count of resources for each clusters respectively

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT ClusterName, count(Resource) AS Resources FROM default.getall_resources
GROUP BY ClusterName
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT ClusterName, count(Resource) AS Resources FROM default.getall_resources
GROUP BY ClusterName

panels.title: Count of Resources per cluster

panels.description: This panel displays the total number resources for each Clusters seperated by Kind.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT ClusterName, Kind, count(Resource) AS Resources FROM default.getall_resources
GROUP BY ClusterName,Kind
ORDER BY Resources DESC
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT ClusterName, Kind, count(Resource) AS Resources FROM default.getall_resources
GROUP BY ClusterName,Kind
ORDER BY Resources DESC

panels.title: Resources per Cluster by Kind

panels.description: This panel displays all the resources running in the kubernetes cluster.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query: SELECT * FROM default.getall_resources
targets.rawQuery: SELECT * FROM default.getall_resources

panels.title: Kubernetes Resources

panels.description: This panel displays all the out-of-date images from the cluster.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT * FROM default.outdated_images
WHERE VersionsBehind > 0
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT * FROM default.outdated_images
WHERE VersionsBehind > 0

panels.title: Outdated Images

panels.description: This panel displays all the DeletedAPIs from the cluster.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query: SELECT * FROM default.DeletedAPIs
targets.rawQuery: SELECT * FROM default.DeletedAPIs

panels.title: DeletedAPIs

panels.description: This panel displays all the DeprecatedAPIs from the cluster.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query: SELECT * FROM default.DeprecatedAPIs
targets.rawQuery: SELECT * FROM default.DeprecatedAPIs

panels.title: DeprecatedAPIs
